subject_terms_3: Textile art and design Malay costumes
physical_appearance: This is a red and gold silk songket. It is rectangular in shape. The panels at either end are decorated with scrolling triangular bamboo motifs and tulip motifs. The central panel is decorated with floral motifs, star motifs, and floral chains. There are no tears seen on the fabric.
title_text: Gold & Coloured Silk Thread & Red Silk Songket Gold and Red Silk Songket
subject_terms_1: folk costume flower (motif) scrolls (motifs) dressing garments
subject_terms_2: Songket Ethnic costume Motifs Malays (Asian people)
